attributes.action: make Chris Cox the manager of the England Football team
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Steve McClaren just isn't cutting it as manager of the England Football Team. We wish to install Chris Cox as manager. He has untold experience of winning international tournaments on SEGA's Football Manager and would surely do a better job than the current coach.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
